meta-review.comment: Resident Evil 4 VR Mode offers an immersive and terrifying experience, bringing the iconic survival horror game to new heights in virtual reality. While the transition from third-person to first-person VR presents some challenges, the game's exceptional graphics and audio design make for a captivating gameplay experience. Resident Evil 4 VR Mode is a must-play for fans of the series and a standout title for PS VR2 owners.
